Scenario: I did not progress the project assigned to I by Ir teacher as scheduled and were criticized by Ir teacher.
Thought: Time is a bit tight and many things are piling up. I have to focus on this project in the next stage.

Scenario: I had an argument with Ir best friend, neither of I gave in and both expressed the desire to break up.
Thought: He said he wanted to end my friendship with me. He hated me.

Scenario: When I applied for the job, HR said that I did not meet the requirements of our company.
Thought: I was struggling academically but I was too scared to ask my lecturers for help. My parents didn't know about my situation and I was too scared to tell them, I was tired of disappointing them.

Scenario: I made an appointment with a classmate to play basketball, but he didn't show up when the time came.
Thought: Why hasn’t he come yet? I’ll give him a call to see if he’s still asleep.

Scenario: I were forced to take nude photos, and I felt very uncomfortable but didn't dare to tell others.
Thought: If other people knew about this, they would definitely think that I had no moral integrity. I can only bury this secret deep in my heart.

Scenario: All Ir classmates have gone out and I are alone in the classroom, feeling a little lonely.

Scenario: Ir parents interfere too much in Ir life and often ask I about what I have been doing recently.

Scenario: I have had a poor appetite recently. I can't eat anything and feel like I have a poor appetite.
Thought: Sometimes I have the feeling that everyone is just using me for their own happiness and doesn't care about me at all.

Scenario: I recently stayed out all night, and Ir father talked to I, and his words were somewhat excited and angry.

Label: No Distortion

Scenario: I eat with Ir friend every day, and suddenly one day she doesn't come to eat with I.

Scenario: I've always thought I were the best employee in the company, but I hear Ir boss doesn't think so.

Scenario: I have been working on a task and I have not made any progress this morning.

Scenario: I go to a restaurant to eat and find a small bug in Ir food.

Scenario: The company I worked for previously went bankrupt due to poor performance, so I have been out of work for half a year.

Scenario: I want to be tall, rich and handsome, but I don’t have money

Thought: I felt like I was being corrupted by something I couldn't get rid of, I was becoming a person I hated, but I couldn't stop it.
